Sentencas: Electrolyte powders with low sintering temperature and high-ionic conductivity can considerably facilitate the fabrication and performance of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: A benzoate coprecipitation route for synthesizing nanocrystalline GDC powder with lowered sintering temperature

Sentencas: Gadolinia-doped ceria (GDC) is a promising electrolyte for developing intermediate- and low-temperature (IT and LT) SOFCs.
Titulo: A benzoate coprecipitation route for synthesizing nanocrystalline GDC powder with lowered sintering temperature

Sentencas: However, the conventional sintering temperature for GDC is usually above 1200 degrees C unless additives are used.
Titulo: A benzoate coprecipitation route for synthesizing nanocrystalline GDC powder with lowered sintering temperature

Sentencas: In this work, a nanocrystalline powder of GDC, (10 mol% Gd dopant, Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95) with low-sintering temperature has been synthesized using ammonium benzoate as a novel, environmentally friendly and cost-effective precursor/precipitant.
Titulo: A benzoate coprecipitation route for synthesizing nanocrystalline GDC powder with lowered sintering temperature

Sentencas: The synthesized benzoate powders (termed washed- and non-washed samples) were calcined at a relatively low temperature of 500 degrees C for 6 h. Physicochemical characteristics were determined using thermal analysis (TG/ DTA), Raman spectroscopy, FT-IR, SEM/EDX, XRD, nitrogen absorptiometry, and dilatometry.
Titulo: A benzoate coprecipitation route for synthesizing nanocrystalline GDC powder with lowered sintering temperature

Sentencas: Dilatometry showed that the newly synthesized GDC samples (washed and non-washed routes) start to shrink at temperatures of 500 and 600 degrees C (respectively), reaching their maximum sintering rate at 650 and 750 degrees C. Sintering of pelletized electrolyte substrates at the sintering onset temperature for commercial GDC powder (950 degrees C) for 6 h, showed densification of washed- and non-washed samples, obtaining 97.48 and 98.43% respectively, relative to theoretical density.
Titulo: A benzoate coprecipitation route for synthesizing nanocrystalline GDC powder with lowered sintering temperature

Sentencas: The electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) analysis for the electrolyte pellets sintered at 950 degrees C showed a total electrical conductivity of 3.83 x 10-2 and 5.90 x 10-2 S cm- 1 (under air atmosphere at 750 degrees C) for washed- and non-washed samples, respectively.
Titulo: A benzoate coprecipitation route for synthesizing nanocrystalline GDC powder with lowered sintering temperature

Sentencas: This is the first report of a GDC synthesis, where a considerable improvement in sinterability and electrical conductivity of the product GDC is observed at 950 degrees C without additives addition.
Titulo: A benzoate coprecipitation route for synthesizing nanocrystalline GDC powder with lowered sintering temperature
